author: Staff Reporter
text:
Three persons were killed on the spot while one person died at the hospital after the car they were travelling hit a stationed LPG tanker lorry near Paramathi here in the early hours of Tuesday.

Saravanan (46), Karthikeyan (27), Sivakumar (27) and Ramasamy (26), all native of Periya Solingapalayam in Kabilarmalai, were returning home after attending a funeral in Namakkal. While nearing Paramathi on Bengaluru – Madurai National Highway, Saravanan who was on the wheels, lost control of the vehicle and rammed the rear side of the lorry that was parked along the national highway. In the impact, the car was completely damaged. While Saravanan, Karthikeyan and Sivakumar died on the spot, Ramasamy suffered injuries and was admitted to a private hospital in Namakkal where he died later. Post-mortem was conducted at Government Hospital in Paramathi Velur and the bodies handed over to their relatives.
title: Four killed in accident near Paramathi
